description: This plugin is responsible for deleting intents. To delete an intent named <name>, the plugin needs to rename the file "../../../../data/plugins_configs/{name}.json" to "../../../../data/archived_plugins/{name}_{timestamp}.json". To activate this plugin, the user will write "delete <name>". The plugin should not be activated immediately. Instead, it should ask the user if they are sure about their decision using the "usual_communication" intent. If the user writes "delete <name>" again, then the plugin should be activated.
